message.content:
Breakfast:
- 2 eggs, cooked to your preference (e.g., scrambled, poached, or fried)
- 1 slice whole grain toast with 1 tbsp of almond butter
- 1 cup fresh fruit salad (e.g., strawberries, blueberries, and kiwi)

Lunch:
- 3 oz grilled chicken breast
- 1 cup quinoa, cooked with 1 cup water or broth
- 2 cups mixed greens (e.g., spinach, arugula, and kale)
- 1/4 avocado, sliced
- 1 tbsp olive oil and lemon juice vinaigrette

Snack:
- 1 medium apple with 1 tbsp natural peanut butter

Dinner:
- 6 oz baked salmon seasoned with herbs (e.g., rosemary, thyme, or dill)
- 1 cup roasted vegetables (e.g., carrots, Brussels sprouts, and sweet potatoes)
- 1/2 cup brown rice, cooked according to package instructions

Dessert:
- 1/2 cup Greek yogurt with 1 tsp honey and a sprinkle of cinnamon

Remember to stay hydrated throughout the day by drinking plenty of water. This meal plan provides a well-rounded mix of protein, healthy fats, and complex carbohydrates while ensuring you get plenty of vitamins and minerals. It also promotes satiety and blood sugar balance.
